H0.text: Storing milk by putting it into the freezer is an example of a chemical reaction.

H1.text: Milk turning sour when left in a warm place is an example of a chemical reaction.

H2.text: Mixing milk into a glass with chocolate powder is an example of a chemical reaction.

H3.text: Allowing milk to evaporate, leaving behind powdered milk is an example of a chemical reaction.

A4.text: Milk naturally contains lactic acid bacteria, the discovery of the fermentation process was quite evident, since it happens spontaneously at an adequate temperature.
